title: Web Development
description: Building responsive and dynamic websites using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and Tailwind CSS.

title: Backend Development
description: Creating robust backend systems with Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, and REST APIs.

title: UI / UX Design
description: Designing user-friendly interfaces using Figma, Canva and modern design principles.

title: Firebase Integration
description: Implementing authentication, database, and hosting using Firebase for modern web apps.

title: Version Control
description: Managing code efficiently using Git and GitHub for collaboration and deployment.

title: Deployment & Hosting
description: Deploying websites and apps using Vercel, Netlify, Surge, and Render.

title: AI & Modern Tech
description: Integrating AI tools, ChatGPT APIs, and modern technologies to enhance web apps.
